content: curious cable sock materials 420yds two birds co s sweet ass sock mystic starshine 2 5mm needles or size needed to obtain gauge this pattern was written for two circular needles but can easily be knit using magic loop or dpns 2 stitch markers cable needle tapestry needle gauge 8 5 stitches per inch in stockinette stitch this sock is knit from the cuff down and features an interesting cable that starts in the cuff and ends at the toe the cable pattern is fun and simple so it s a great pattern for someone who wants to change up from vanilla socks for the sock veteran it s a simple soothing knit that has enough happening so it won t be boring the perfect pattern to showcase hand dyed yarn �1 abbreviations k knit p purl k2tog knit 2 stitches together slm slip marker cn cable needle p2tog purl 2 stitches together pm place marker ssk slip slip knit slip one stitch as if to knit slip one as if to purl and knit them together through the back loops pfcnl slip 3 stitches to cn and hold in the back knit 3 purl 3 from cn kfcnl slip 3 stitches to cn and hold in the back purl 3 knit 3 from cn pfcnr slip 3 stitches to cn and hold in the front knit 3 purl 3 from cn kfcnr slip 3 stitches to cn and hold in the front purl 3 knit 3 from cn ** repeat pattern instructions the pattern is worked over 24 rounds the cable pattern starts on the first round of the cuff the cable is mirrored so make sure you knit the correct cable pattern on the correct sock the charted instructions are on the last page of this pattern curious cable pattern the pattern is worked over the 10 stitches that are between the markers the other stitches are worked in ribbing for the cuff or knit for the leg and foot left curious cable round 1 and all odd rounds slm p2 k6 p2 slm round 2 4 6 8 and 10 slm p5 k3 p2 slm round 12 slm p2 pfcnl p2 slm round 14 16 18 20 and 22 slm p2 k3 p5 slm round 24 slm p2 kfcnl p2 slm �2 © 2018 two birds knitting co please do not copy or distribute this pattern without permission from the designer email twobirdsknitting@gmail com right curious cable round 1 and all odd rounds slm p2 k6 p2 slm round 2 4 6 8 and 10 slm p2 k3 p5 slm round 12 slm p2 kfcnr p2 slm round 14 16 18 20 and 22 slm p5 k3 p2 slm round 24 slm p2 pfcnr p2 slm cuff cast on 64 stitches i recommend using a stretchy cast on method i use a long tail cast on divide evenly on two needles and prepare for joining in the round the cable pattern in this sock is worked over
